title: Distributions
text: Notice that the graph shows a moot point curve towards the right. This is an indication of a skewed graph.
speech: Notice that the graph shows a moot point curve towards the right. This is an indication of a skewed graph.
pacedSpeech: Notice that the graph shows a moot point curve towards the right. This is an indication of a skewed graph.

title: Distributions
text: To name skewed graphs, the tail end with lower probability is the direction of the skew. What direction does the tail point?
speech: To name skewed graphs, the tail end with lower probability is the direction of the skew. What direction does the tail point?
pacedSpeech: To name skewed graphs, the tail end with lower probability is the direction of the skew. What direction does the tail point?

title: Distributions
text: Since the tail is to the right, we call this distribution right skewed
speech: Since the tail is to the right, we call this distribution right skewed
